    • Analysis scripts: longitudinal ESBL carriage

Data: Results of simulations from the model posterior

btESBL_model2simulations.Rd

These simulations set the antimicrobial and hospital exposure to arbitrary values, set starting probability of colonisation to 0.5 then draw parameter values from the posterior of the fitted model (btESBL_model2posterior) to generate probability of being ESBL colonised a time t later

btESBL_model2simulations

Format

A data frame with 600,000 rows and 18 variables:

time

Number of days post enrollment

1

Probability of being ESBL non-colonised at current time

0

Probability of being ESBL colonised at current time

draw

Unique ID of draw from posterior (1,2...1000)

hosp_days

Number of days of hospitalisation

abx_days

Number of days of antimicrobial exposure

p0

Probability at time 0 of being uncolonised

p1

Probability at time 0 of being colonised

abx_start

Time of antimicrobial exposure start

abx_stop

Time of antimicrobial exposure stop

prev_abx

Time of cessation of prev antimicrobial exposure (999=none)

hosp_start

Time of hospitalisation start

hosp_stop

Time of hospitalisation stop

prev_hosp

Time of cessation of prev hospitalisation (999=none)

Contents
